title: DATS publication schema
description: A (digital) document made available by a publisher.

title.description: The name of the publication, usually one sentece or short description of the publication.

type.description: Publication type, ideally delegated to an external vocabulary/resource.

publicationVenue.description: The name of the publication venue where the document is published if applicable.

dates.description: Relevant dates, the date of the publication must be provided.

authors.description: The person(s) and/or organisation(s) responsible for the publication.

authorsList.description: The list of authors made available as a string (does not allow disambiguation).

acknowledges.description: The grant(s) which funded and supported the work reported by the publication.

licenses.description: The terms of use of the publication.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
